about_the_game:
Skate, tackle, and roll your way up to glory in Roller Champions™. Discover a free-to-play, team PvP sports game like no other!

Welcome to 2032. Arenas are built all over the world and fans rush to the stands to admire their modern-day heroes, the Roller Champions. They roll up to 100 miles an hour, tackle opponents, wall-skate, and dunk while thousands of fans scream their names.

As a Roller Champion, compete in a team of three against three. The rules are simple: take the ball, make a lap while maintaining team possession, dodge opponents, and score. Go for more points by completing additional laps before attempting a goal. After each match, gain fans to compete in bigger arenas. Customize characters and create a unique destiny.



GATHER YOUR TEAM AND COMPETE

Team up with two players and dive into Roller Champions’ gameplay, which combines fun competitive action and collaborative team play.
  • Go head-to-head against the opposing team through speed, wit, crushing tackles, and daring dodges to lap around the arena and be the first team to reach 5 points by throwing the ball through the hoop.
  • Feel the thrill of riding up and down the wall of the arena as you gain speed, quickly stop, pivot, and re-position as your teammates race towards the goal, just one pass away from winning or one interception away from having to start all over again.

FROM ZERO TO HERO – BUILD A LIFE OF A WORLD-RENOWNED ATHLETE

Write your own legend. Start your sports career as the underdog and roll up to glory as you win matches.
  • Obtain more fans in arena bleachers as you complete spectacular actions and progress to bigger stadiums.
  • Write your name in Roller Champions’ history books as you climb up the leaderboards.
  • Progress through Roller Champions’ ranked mode from Garage league all the way to the Elite Champions’ league.
  • Compete in thrilling time-limited special game mode to gain fans or special lootballs.

CREATE AND FULLY CUSTOMIZE YOUR SPORT LEGEND

Create your own character and customize your outfit as you progress.
  • Unlock new items, including skates, helmets, fresh attires, gloves, goal effects, emotes, air poses, player titles and banners.
  • Progress through the Roller Pass to gain season-exclusive items, spectacular goal FX and emotes, lootballs and in-game currency (wheels).

COME HANG IN THE SKATEPARK

Roller Champions’ social hub is THE place to be to meet up and learn the ropes with your friends!
  • Roll around, practice scoring and learn new tricks.
  • Participate to time-limited minigames.

name: Roller Champions™

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 // AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4Gb // AMD RX 560 4Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 // AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti 4Gb // AMD RX 470 8Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

oflc.descriptors:
Very mild violence
Online interactivity
In-game purchases

short_description: Skate and roll your way up to glory in Roller Champions™. Discover a free-to-play, team PvP sports game like no other!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
